185726151.review:
This is the perfect example of a fighting game that's clearly well-made but not for me.

What started off as an indie game is clearly inspired by Marvel vs. Capcom, and it shows. A lot of the mechanics follow the typical team-based fighting game style with assists. The main gimmick I like is that you can (in theory) pick only 2 or even 1 character and have your health scale up, but generally, this is not recommended.

The character designs certainly "stick out," but I've personally never been into the art style of Skullgirls; it definitely has that "early Western indie game" feel.

While the game is kind of fun to mess around with solo, I just don't think it's as enjoyable or polished as later (or even earlier) team games when playing against any competition. The balance is super whack and heavily reliant on combos and Touch of Death mechanics, with not many good defensive options.

The story mode is amusing enough, and I'm glad it's fully voiced, but I just didn't really care about any of the characters by the end, even though I completed all the story modes (in the Switch version).

When this game was one of the few to actually use GGPO rollback netcode, I might have given it a more positive recommendation. However, with so many more dynamic, better-looking, balanced, and more fun-to-play versions of anime-style/team-based fighting games available now, Skullgirls just doesn't hold up for me personally these days.

I do have to give props for showing that indie fighting games can be a thing, especially lasting over a decade.

184910669.review:
Skullgirls è un picchiaduro che è stato acclamato dalla critica per molte ragioni, ed è un motivo preciso.
Le storie sono state fatte in un modo veramente bene, ogni storia ha un evento, e ci sono anche i cosideti joke characters, ovvero i personaggi fatti per scherzo e che contengono easter eggs da altri giochi, ed è una cosa buona, quindi ha un ottima trama su ogni personaggio e sul finale.
Gli ambienti sono fatti veramente bene con dei personaggi del background che alcuni sono i kickstarted che hanno supportato il gioco quando era stato creato, ed è una cosa buona su questo.
Il boss finale è veramente fatto bene e se usi uno specifico personaggio conoscerai di più la sua trama divenendo qualcosa di grandioso.
I DLC sono tutti belli, ogni personaggio veniva rilasciato gratis per un tempo limitato ed era una cosa buona, io avevo iniziato a metà e quindi quando ho giocato con tutti...era già alla fine.
Poi il gioco divenne 2nd Encore ed è li che lo sviluppo era diventato decente, nuovi personaggi che abbiamo desiderato tanto e naturalmente tantissime altre novità.
Ma 2 anni fa...il gioco venite come dicono tutti ed è vero su questo, censurato, oggetti venivano rimossi, la trama fu riscritta, e alcuni personaggi persero la loro personalità, causando un enorme rappresaglia che finite con il classico anti-bombing review action che obbliga a tutti di stare indietro e a pensare, ma...hanno il diritto, perché la digital artwork gallery, un DLC per vedere tutti i disegni fatti da diversi artisti durante il kickstart e il rilascio, furono cancellati, e per la discussione è ormai diventata la solita zolfa, due persone contro l'intera community di Skullgirls, dove in una parte accettano il cambiamento e dicono che non succederà niente e devono accettarlo, l'altra parte invece voglio che la censura venga rimossa oppure abbia l'opzione di scegliere se avere la censura oppure no nel commando opzioni...ormai questa discussione è diventata cosi monotoma che rappresenta ormai tutta la comunità di Skullgirls.
So che alcuni penseranno da che parte stare e voglio dire la mia, anche se non gioco più ed ho mancato i DLC del passato e quelli nuovi, ho sempre amato il gioco per i suoi personaggi, ed adorato la storia, quando ho sentito della censura ho sentito una fitta al cuore, ma allo stesso tempo vedendo la comunità come era diventata ormai era peggio, si affrontano l'uno all'altro e le discussioni sono sempre le stesse, ma se volete un enorme cambiamento o almeno la rimozione della censura...dovete marcare in vita reale nel quartier generale che ha fatto il gioco e fare una protesta pacifica finché non verranno ascoltate le vostre richieste.
Per il resto, Skullgirls è un gioco fatto bene ed è godibile, anche se ho ricevuto questo gioco come regalo da un amico che mi ha fatto esaudire il desiderio, è veramente qualcosa di bello, quindi do a questo gioco un 9.5 spaccato, senza pensare alla censura, ma allo stesso tempo, supportare le azioni della comunità per invertire la situazione.

184593010.review:
[h1]日本語音声は設定から各キャラごとに日本語に切り替えないと英語がデフォルトになってるので注意[/h1]

ストーリーに関してはネタバレになるのであまり書きたくないのですが、
買って後悔する人がいないようにあまりネタバレにならない程度に注意喚起を暗転しておきます。
※純粋に楽しみたい人はスルー推奨
[spoiler]
ストーリーはメリーバッドが多く、完全にバッドエンドなキャラ個別エンドもあるのでそういうのが苦手な人は避けた方がいい。
後味が苦いものもあるとはいえ、そこもまた魅力あるストーリーとなっていると思います。
とはいえ格闘ゲームのシナリオなので長文というわけでもなくサクッとプレイできます
[/spoiler]

アニメーションも凝っていて、絵が気に入ったらセールなら買っていいと思う
BGMが雰囲気があってアニメ見てる感じでした

格闘ゲームとしては攻撃後の硬直時間が長すぎて、連打で手数稼げるタイプの格ゲーじゃなくてタイミングよく攻撃出して繋いでいくリズムゲーに近いかも
個人的には弱は硬直無く連打できる方が快適に遊べて好きなのでストレスだったかな
お互いの攻撃が同時にぶつかった際は相殺では無くて、クロスカウンターみたいに両方ダメージ入るのも地味にいやでした(こちらのダメージは微量でNPC側は超火力)

絵・ＢＧＭ・ストーリーに満足、格闘システムにやや不満(とはいえ必要十分は満たしててそこそこ快適)という感想
作品のみを評価して、おすすめします

184501738.review:
5/10. Skullgirls has always had a fluctuating reputation.

I love the *gameplay* of skullgirls and the character writing is very on point, but in the game's current state and lack of... well content, I can't exactly recommend it in good faith.

The community for skullgirls has been split into three or so factions: 

A: The Overly loyal, blind to the problems brought on by the way the new devs kicked the old devs out and removed content

B: The Angered, Some justified, some not. In any case the angered are split between people rightfully angry at content that they **very specifically paid for**, being removed from the game.
The people angry that "panty shots" from characters who are depicted as minors were removed from the game are genuinely creepy.

The Devs removed story related content, such as Big band's backstory of fighting against a corrupt police system, and erased tons of the story content from the continuity of the game for no reason. They even removed DLC content and didn't warn players about the removal *AND* removed beta branches of the game that have the DLC content( in the art book). Very scummy behavior.

Example: The Red Egrets. A lawful evil faction who were supposed to have nazi-esque symbolism using red arm bands and german WW1 and WW2 gas masks, helmets, etc.
I want my bad guys to look evil, not like muddied messes of dark green. The red arm bands also served as a stark contrast to an otherwise all green/black/grey color palette, balancing the visual designs of the characters who wore the evil faction uniform.
They are bad guys, they are evil. Let them look as the evil they are. 
If the devs wanted to censor stuff like Big band getting beaten up in his story or the Egrets, why could they not add a "censored version" in the options menu? That would cater to their points that they wanted without needlessly removing visual design elements from the cannon design of the main bad guys.


The DLC characters added to the game also begged the question, "why not just make Skullgirls 3rd Encore in the way 2nd encore was made?" and frankly the conclusion that the devs came to was... nothing. There's no real reason for them to have milked the community of DLC characters in the way that they did. 
Supposedly, we were going to get a real story mode once all of the characters from the DLC were finished. It's been 3 years since Annie released and there has been no news as to what is going on with the game's development.

I can't, in good faith, recommend this game when even if you ignore all the shady practices of removing content that people paid for, even if you ignore the removal of story elements and lies about "we will add a story mode", even if you ignore the half-baked state the DLC characters released in,

That doesn't solve the problems of a super low playerbase. Buying this game means spending hundreds of hours learning against people who have Thousands of hours of playtime. It's very unlikely that Skullgirls is going to get a revival, ergo it dies as it started.  Fun gameplay, interesting characters, bad everything else.

183968412.review:
I probably have 100+ hours on PS3 and PS4 from playing very casually over the past decade, and I respect all the creators from the original project who continue to do great work on this classic game.

That being said, I vehemently disagree with the decision to censor the game, even if only lightly in the grand scheme of things. It's dumb to me that you can slapstick molly-wallop a woman to death, that's taken for granted, but oh, god forbid you see her underwear as you do it, that's immoral.

I simply don't believe there's a coherent argument for why transgressive cartoon sex fantasies are inherently bad, while Mortal Kombat's photorealistic gore that gave the devs PTSD is totally hella and gets to chill. You either die a based nerd, or live long enough to see yourself become Jack Thompson, I guess.

I found a lot of value in Skullgirls as a blend of many cultural inspirations, which can be surmised to come from the diversity of it's team. At the end of the day, the game is still Alex Ahad's unabashed guro simulator, there's no changing that. Double and Painwheel are monstrosities with bizarre, necrotic, yet vaguely feminine physicality, nearly every girl's body has been invaded by some parasite or demon or whatever, the final boss is an undead loli, it's so blatant bruh. That combined with the art deco flavor, the animal people, the music, there's no other game quite like it.

As a result, the censorship that IS there would feel ridiculously feeble, craven, and halfhearted to anyone who legitimately believed this stuff was immoral (aka no one who knows what a skullgirl is). Filia's still a ridonkulously thicc schoolgirl in a short skirt. She still has a skin referencing the main girl from Highschool Of The Dead. They can't even try removing those massive, meaty, meticulously kneesock-pinched thighs from all 1400 of her sprites, because that would take such a momentous effort and probably look like trash anyway.
Not even gonna touch the Big Band or Parasoul stuff.

Anyways, I was perfectly happy with the game as a complete product in the interim years where it seemed like it was finished, so while the new characters are cool and all, I'm totally un-invested in Skullgirls continuing as the studio's workhorse forever-game. (an understandable choice after Indivisible was such a logistical nightmare, but still)

I've also read that the new fighters don't play nice with inserting files from old uncensored versions of the game, so I'm waiting until they're on sale for like $1 each to buy them.

[tl;dr] just give me an option in the settings to turn the edgy stuff back on. it can be off by default, that's fine, i get it, it's not for everyone. don't even mention it in the patch notes, those concerned enough will find it, trust me

183758262.review: Mobildeki haline göre beta versiyonuymuş gibi hissettiren tırt oyun. Mobilde oyun bedava ve bütün karakterler açıkken burada oyuna ayrı para 4-5 karaktere ayrı para vermeniz lazım. Ayrıca skill diye bir şey yok onun yerine combat mekaniği var ve sadece dümdüz dalıyosunuz. Telefondaki gibi girip kasılayım günlük etkinliklerden xp, anahtar falan kasar sandık açarım, seviyem yükselsin diye bir şey zaten yok, karakter geliştirme yok, karakterlerin skill ağacı yok. Tamamen ''dümdüz gir 1 saat takıl stres at çık'' oyunu. Arcade ve survival modları zaten rezalet ve çok yavan. Gerçekten telefondakinden daha iyi olur diye alıp 10 kat tırt çıkması üzdü beni kontroller özellikle çok boktan. Eğer bu türün hayranıysanız oyunu gidip telefondan oynayın.

183705029.review:
Con tanto tiempo jugado, puedo confirmar que es un juegazo.
El apartado artístico es HERMOSO, los diseños son muy interesantes e originales, los recolores están muy facheros también. La banda sonora tampoco se queda atras.
Ame la opción de poder elegir la voz de tu personaje, cada personaje teniendo de entre 2 A 3 voces para elegir (ingles-japones y voz alternativa en ingles).
El gameplay es, si bien difícil, increíblemente satisfactorio y divertido. La opción de poder elegir cuantos personajes quieras 
es increíble, y se pone mejor aun cuando el juego te deja elegir CUALQUIER ATAQUE como asistencia, dando lugar a combos o setups muy locos.
Quizá sea algo difícil si eres nuevo en los juegos de pelea... pero el juego vale totalmente la pena, y mas aun si te lo encontras en oferta.

183694861.review: O jogo é muito bom, extremamente bem animado e tem peitos o suficiente pra deixar qualquer um satisfeito. Porém.. Muitos poucos personagens, o online praticamente não existe, ninguém joga ele atualmente. E a campanha é ctrl c + v com todos os personagens, onde o mesmo objetivo é ir atras da skull heart. 30 minutos e olhe lá você termina a campanha do personagem. Mas mesmo assim, ele é divertido, compre o jogo se ele estiver custando menos que 5 reais (eu paguei 4,74)

183682459.review: Essa promoção, de 4 reais esta imperdível para o nível de qualidade deste game, podem confiar e um jogo de luta muito divertido vale cada Centavo gasto nele, se vc e um jogador de jogos de lutas hardcore o online deste jogo vai te suprir muito bem vc e um jogador casual só quer jogar e se divertir sem muita enrolação esse jogo e perfeito o campanha e bem rápido e bem explicativo a historia e boa nada de outro mundo mais bem interessante, para vc que tem um Pc Bomba fica tranquilo os requisitos desse jogo não são de outro mundo pode adquirir sem medo e se divertir, para vc que só quer alguma coisa para estourar seu amiguinho na pancada sem vc e ele gastar muito tai uma boa escolha tanto no tela divida quanto no Multiplayer 10/10.

183516536.review:
Sinceramente no soy fan del género de peleas y no había jugado uno antes, pero AME este juego. Tengo que resaltar el diseño de los personajes y el apartado artístico tan único que es lo que llama la atención.
Aunque sean 18 personajes, cada uno tiene movimientos y manera de jugar completamente diferentes y originales por lo que se pueden adaptar a tu manera de jugar facílmente; y si te aburres, aprender uno nuevo. Cuenta con modo historia y logros a desbloquear muy curiosos. Increíble como después de tantos años este juego sigue de pie, actualizandose y con una comunidad activa, espero que siga así. Lo recomiendo bastante. 🦦
